verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees.<s%> When the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> turned <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7870>captivity<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> we <S%H1961>were<s%> like them that <S%H2492>dream.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> was our <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7814>laughter,<s%> and our <S%H3956>tongue<s%> with <S%H7440>singing:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> they among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1431>things<s%> <S%H5973>for<s%> <S%H428>them.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1431>things<s%> <S%H5973>for<s%> us; whereof we <S%H1961>are<s%> <S%H8056>glad.<s%>
Turn <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as the <S%H650>streams<s%> in the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

He that goeth <S%H1980>forth<s%> <S%H1980><s%> and <S%H1058>weepeth,<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H4901>precious<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> shall doubtless come <S%H935>again<s%> <S%H935><s%> with <S%H7440>rejoicing,<s%> <S%H5375>bringing<s%> his <S%H485>sheaves<s%> with him.
